scenario.name: UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$uas_number]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[$uas_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: [$uac_number] <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length:[len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 101 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-11,16

INVITE sip:[$uas_number]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[$uas_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: [$uac_number] <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 [authentication username="[$uac_number]" password="[$uac_passwd]"] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length:[len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 101 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-11,16

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[$uas_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] [routes] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: [$uac_number] <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[$uas_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] [routes] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: [$uac_number] <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$uas_number]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[$uas_number]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] [routes] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: [$uac_number] <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
